java.nio.DoubleBuffer

  • ??DoubleBuffer???? 
    ??? ??
    java.nio
    Defines buffers, which are containers for data, and provides an overview of the other NIO packages.

      Allocates a new double buffer.
      abstract DoubleBuffer ByteBuffer.asDoubleBuffer()
      Creates a view of this byte buffer as a double buffer.

      Creates a new, read-only double buffer that shares this buffer's content.
      abstract DoubleBuffer DoubleBuffer.compact()
      Compacts this buffer  (optional operation).
      abstract DoubleBuffer DoubleBuffer.duplicate()
      Creates a new double buffer that shares this buffer's content.

      Relative bulk get method.

      Relative bulk put method  (optional operation).
      abstract DoubleBuffer DoubleBuffer.put(int index, double d)
      Absolute put method  (optional operation).
      abstract DoubleBuffer DoubleBuffer.slice()
      Creates a new double buffer whose content is a shared subsequence of this buffer's content.

      Wraps a double array into a buffer.
